statements: SELECT * FROM articles;
SELECT title, author FROM articles;
SELECT * FROM articles WHERE published_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT title, author, published_date FROM articles WHERE author = 'John Doe';
SELECT title, published_date FROM articles ORDER BY published_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM articles ORDER BY published_date DESC, article_id ASC LIMIT 3
SELECT title, author FROM articles WHERE author LIKE 'John%'
SELECT * FROM articles WHERE published_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2022-01-01'
SELECT title, content FROM articles WHERE title ILIKE '%database%'
SELECT author, COUNT(*) AS article_count FROM articles GROUP BY author ORDER BY article_count DESC
SELECT * FROM articles WHERE article_id = 1;
SELECT title, author, publish_date FROM articles WHERE publish_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT author_name, author_bio FROM authors WHERE author_id = 2;
SELECT title, content FROM articles WHERE author = 'John Doe';
SELECT * FROM articles ORDER BY publish_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM articles WHERE author = 'John Smith';
SELECT article_id, title, publish_date FROM articles WHERE publish_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT author_name, COUNT(*) AS article_count FROM articles JOIN authors ON articles.author = authors.author_name GROUP BY author_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT title, content FROM articles WHERE publish_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY publish_date DESC;
SELECT author_name, author_bio FROM authors WHERE author_name LIKE '%Doe%' ORDER BY author_name ASC;
SELECT title, author FROM news_articles;
SELECT author, publish_date FROM news_articles ORDER BY publish_date DESC;
SELECT title, content FROM news_articles WHERE author = 'John Doe';
SELECT * FROM news_articles WHERE publish_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT title, tag_name FROM news_articles JOIN article_references ON news_articles.article_id = article_references.article_id JOIN article_tags ON article_references.tag_id = article_tags.tag_id;
SELECT * FROM news_articles;
SELECT title, author FROM news_articles ORDER BY publish_date DESC;
SELECT article_id, title, author, publish_date FROM news_articles WHERE author='John Doe';

SELECT title, tag_name FROM news_articles INNER JOIN article_references ON news_articles.article_id = article_references.article_id INNER JOIN article_tags ON article_references.tag_id = article_tags.tag_id;
SELECT title, publish_date FROM news_articles WHERE publish_date BETWEEN '2023-01-01' AND '2023-12-31';
SELECT organization_name, location FROM MediaOrganization WHERE organization_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM MediaOrganization WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT organization_id, organization_name FROM MediaOrganization ORDER BY organization_name DESC;
SELECT organization_name FROM MediaOrganization WHERE organization_id IN (2, 3, 4);
SELECT MAX(organization_id) AS max_id FROM MediaOrganization;
SELECT organization_name, location FROM MediaOrganization WHERE organization_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM MediaOrganization WHERE organization_name LIKE '%news%';
SELECT organization_name, location FROM MediaOrganization WHERE organization_id > 2 ORDER BY organization_name DESC;
SELECT COUNT(organization_id) AS total_organizations FROM MediaOrganization;
SELECT organization_name, location FROM MediaOrganization WHERE location = 'California' ORDER BY organization_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM ArticleArchive WHERE publish_date = '2023-01-15';
SELECT title, author FROM ArticleArchive WHERE content LIKE '%technology%';
SELECT author, publish_date FROM ArticleArchive ORDER BY publish_date DESC;
SELECT name, email FROM Author WHERE bio IS NOT NULL;
SELECT name, department FROM Editor WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com%' ORDER BY department ASC;
SELECT title, author, publish_date FROM ArticleArchive WHERE author = 'John Doe'
SELECT name, email, bio FROM Author WHERE bio IS NOT NULL
SELECT editor_id, name, department FROM Editor ORDER BY editor_id DESC
SELECT * FROM Publisher WHERE location LIKE '%New York%'
SELECT name, manager, location FROM Department WHERE manager != '' ORDER BY name
